content:
/>
X.i.6.E.3.a
.
Use of the IDES Development Checklist
MSCs must complete an
IDES Development Checklist
for each IDES case.
MSCs may select to either
initiate the checklist at the onset of the claim to help guide development actions, or
complete the checklist prior to transferring the case to the DRAS to certify that all appropriate development actions have been taken.
The checklist may be completed electronically or printed for completion in hard copy, but in all cases, it must be incorporated into the participant’s electronic claims folder (eFolder) upon completion of development action, as is discussed in Step 9 of
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.F.3.d
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section E - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES), Referrals, and Initial Processing
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section E
